src_original: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[37]
tgt_original: vīryabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 4 ||

src_original: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[38]
tgt_original: dhyānabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 5 ||

src_original: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[39]
tgt_original: prajñabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 6 ||

src_original: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam || [34]
tgt_original: dānabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 1 ||

src_original: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśantam ||[35]
tgt_original: śīlabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 2 ||

src_original: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikasya pure praviśāntam ||[36]
tgt_original: kṣāntibalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 3 ||
